Text.content:
OpenCms is a typed content management system. Each resource in the VFS has a specific type and in particular each XML content has a specific type and a configuration that determines how the type and contents of it are displayed in apps, e.g., in the page editor.

To manage your resource types, OpenCms 11 introduces a special app. Here you can add, edit or move resource types. Moreover, you get easy access to all resources of a type present in your current installation and to the schema file for XML contents.
